titles.title: Commending the Government of Japan for its current policy against currency manipulation and encouraging the Government of Japan to continue in this policy.
Commending the Government of Japan for its current policy against currency manipulation and encouraging the Government of Japan to continue in this policy.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: International monetary system and foreign exchange

bill.summary:
Commends the Government of Japan for its reversal in policy regarding currency manipulation.
Encourages it to maintain this new policy, thereby conforming to its responsibilities as a member of the International Monetary Fund (IMF) and the World Trade Organization (WTO), as well as promoting free and fair international trade.
